channel.title: Ubuntu = gay kthnxbye
channel.description:
Installed Ubuntu = windows deleted without any CD's.O great im stuck with soem piece of shit i dont even like kthnxbye.
Points: No linux for u

item.title: Ubuntu = gay kthnxbye
item.dc:creator: @Goat_Spirit Goat Spirit
item.description:
@Goat_Spirit wrote:

[quote=“regecks`, post:28, topic:46786”][quote author=Goat Spirit link=topic=65139.msg789921#msg789921 date=1169183322]
I have Linspire, it’s alright. No distro in my opinion ‘sucks’. Anything is better then Windows.
[/quote]That’s silly.

Really, when you break it down, you have:

  • The people who could use Mac/Windows, because they need to do their browsing or email or other non-technical hobby without too much hassle.
  • The people who can only use Windows because a huge part of their computer use involves a Windows-only program. Don’t get me started on emulation, what’s the point?
  • The people who need Linux because that’s what they grew up with.
  • The people who use Linux because they claim it’s better? It doesn’t matter, most of the time. If you are so worried about stability of your system, you are the exception, not the norm :P. ==> htttp://www.cygwin.com (I use it heavily)

What a useless post ;P.

Anyway, Windows is a great desktop OS k k QQ.[/quote]
All of that can be done on Linux without emulation, and at a better rate.

Read full topic

item.title: Ubuntu = gay kthnxbye
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

And Linux is also a great desktop OS, even for “The people who could use Mac/Windows”. Look at the recent popularity of *buntu.

Read full topic

Really, when you break it down, you have:

  • The people who could use Mac/Windows, because they need to do their browsing or email or other non-technical hobby without too much hassle.
  • The people who can only use Windows because a huge part of their computer use involves a Windows-only program. Don’t get me started on emulation, what’s the point?
  • The people who need Linux because that’s what they grew up with.
  • The people who use Linux because they claim it’s better? It doesn’t matter, most of the time. If you are so worried about stability of your system, you are the exception, not the norm :P. ==> htttp://www.cygwin.com (I use it heavily)

What a useless post ;P.

Anyway, Windows is a great desktop OS k k QQ.

item.title: Ubuntu = gay kthnxbye
item.dc:creator: @DeadBird DeadBird
item.description:
@DeadBird wrote:

[quote=“Goat Spirit, post:24, topic:46786”][quote author=DeadBird link=topic=65139.msg785593#msg785593 date=1169088931]
Ironically the linux distros that you pay for suck terribly :S.
[/quote]
Eh, no. Try to actually try and play with it awhile before saying ‘they suck’. You have no idea how much one puts into making a distro.[/quote]
The only distros I know of that you pay for are Linux-XP (I had good laugh when I saw it) and Linspire. Neither of them match up to some of the free distros at all.

Read full topic
